Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet (fish)
Description: Amulet in the shape of a fish. The dorsal fin and tail are represented by parallel lines. The distinction between the head and the body is indicated by two incisions. One surface is flat, the other convex. There are no traces of a device for suspension.
